data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Trelawny that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Trelawny, Jamaica

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Trelawny, Jamaica know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.section_summary: On average, 4 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Trelawny, Jamaica.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Trelawny. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Trelawny who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Wakefield
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Wakefield, Trelawny, Jamaica.
Father, may the churches in Trelawny, Jamaica honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Trelawny, Jamaica.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.section_summary:
the state of Trelawny, Jamaica has a population of 78,500.

We estimate Trelawny has 23,354 people who might know Jesus, 40,511 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 14,636 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 23,354 believers in Trelawny to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

location.name: Trelawny
location.cities_list: Falmouth, Albert Town, Wakefield, Duncans, Ulster Spring
location.cities_list_w_pop: Falmouth (7,779), Albert Town (3,449), Wakefield (2,763), Duncans (1,876), Ulster Spring (1,411)
